official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for the adjournment of the Senate from Thursday, October 18, 1973, to Tuesday, October 23, 1973.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides that when the Senate adjourns on Thursday, October 18, 1973, it stands adjourned until 12 o'clock meridian, Tuesday, October 23, 1973, and that when the House adjourns on Thursday, October 18, 1973, it stands adjourned until 12 o'clock meridian on Tuesday, October 23, 1973.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for the adjournment of the Senate from Thursday, October 18, 1973, to Tuesday, October 23, 1973.
